Research & Production Company ERGA

Russian largest manufacturer
of magnetic systems and industrial equipment

About ERGA

The key activity of the company is development and production of equipment for mineral processing, air-gravity separation, complete solutions for the processing of various waste and separation of materials by electrical properties.

  • Research

    LIMiTS testing laboratory / Testing laboratory for mineral and industrial raw materials

  • Design

    Design and engineering solution of the tasks

  • Production since 1991

    > 25 000 m² of modern production faciities

  • Implementation

    Professional service support: supervision and commissioning works, equipment diagnostics and repair, training of the customer's maintenance personnel

  • ISO 9001: 2015 quality system

  • > 200 qualified employees

  • Full production cycle

  • Successful experience in export deliveries

OUR TRADEMARKS

  • ERGA

    Production of magnetic separators, iron separators and specialized equipment. ERGA produces more than 60 types of industrial and laboratory equipment under ERGA trademark. ERGA equipment is continuously improved and modernized, thus ensuring high performance, operational reliability and safety while increasing cost efficiency of their application.

  • RESOLINE

    RESOLINE complete process solutions. Research and Production Company “ERGA” designs and produces customized complete plants and lines. The scope of supply depends on the task and can include various types of our industrial equipment.

  • ERGUARD

    Manufacture of ERGUARD industrial metal detectors. ERGA manufactures ERGUARD industrial conveyorized, gravity and pipeline metal detectors designed to protect process equipment from damage and fast wear, control quality of raw materials, semi-finished and finished products.

  • ЭЛКРОН

    Manufacture of ELKRON electrostatic and triboelectrostatic separators. ERGA manufactures industrial and laboratory ELKRON drum corona electrostatic separators for dry separation of materials with different electrical properties.

ELKRON ESS electrostatic separators

Electrostatic corona drum separator for separation of materials with different electrical properties.

  • Separation/cleaning efficiency up to 99.8%
  • High capacity
  • Fine adjustment of separation mode
  • Automatic cleaning of electrodes
  • Touch Screen intuitive control
  • Reliable components from the world leading manufacturers (Japan, Germany)
  • Low power consumption (from 0,25 kW)
  • Dry separation method
